name: Jimmie Osborn
text: Lousy service and lousy birned crust. Do not go here expecting good service or good food. Beware! One star is one too many!

name: Joey George
text: It's cheap, but they lack the capacity to continually turn out pizzas during peak hours.  Gaps in the oven conveyor. Does management punish for taking the risks of making too many pizzas?  Dominoes is not hot and ready, but there's a 10 min. Wait. 10 to 15 here, but is supposed to be hot and ready.  Turned off for good

name: Kevin Moore
text: When your hungry, but only have $10 in your wallet, then order a deep pan pizza from Little Caesars! Not a bad pie for the price! I ordered a deep pan half all meat, half pepperoni with extra cheese and paid under $10

name: Robert Toledo
text: Great service and always takes care of there customers with a smile. And if they get an order wrong they will make it right by making an another pizza or things of wings

text: We have gone to this Lil Caesar's a number of times. Each time I end up kicking myself in the butt for it. I think out of a handful of times I've only gotten one fresh pizza. It's not hard telling an fresh pizza from an old one that's been ‚Ä¶More

text: Love the $5. Hot n ready but for some reason they charge $6. Smh.** Update** 7/15/16 tried to give this place another try even tho its $6. Hot n ready went in on a weekday not pizza wasn't hot or ready so we left. Tried to go on a Friday ‚Ä¶More

text: The. Worst. Little Caesar's. I once tried to stop by and it the door was locked nearly 30 minutes before closing. In 4 visits they have never had their "hot and ready" pizza actually ready. Now I place carry out orders and in the 15 minutes ‚Ä¶More

text: Wanted to try the new crazy pizza bites but they didn't have enough cheese to make them the girl said. Ordered cinnamon bites she said would take 3 min. Tipped the girl 1.00 and she didn't even say thank you. Took longer then 3 minutes. Will take food home and try it now.
